short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A set of features to enhance reddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RedditBoost provides a suite of features for Reddit to improve user experience in a lightweight and convenient manner. Features include,

* hover image preview
* user tagging
* link mirrors for popular submissions
* subreddit blocking
* user comment and/or submission banning

This extension is currently in beta. As an open source project, contributions are always welcome!
